SELECT child.id, child.name, child.user_Id as userId, child.address, child.update_time as updateTime, child.introduce as introduce, parent.id as parentId, parent.name as parentName, tuser.job_no as jobNo, tuser.user_phone as cellPhone, tuser.user_email as email, tuser.user_nick_name as userName FROM t_department child left join t_department parent on parent.id = child.parent_id left join t_user tuser on tuser.id = child.user_id
AND child.name like concat('%',concat(#{param.name},'%'))
order by child.update_time
